page.shortlink: ux control properties other properties button appearance button class disabled
page.description: Button class when the button is disabled. You can enter <Default>, or leave blank, to use the default class name. Specify <None> for no class. If you specify your own class name here you can prefix it with '+' to use the specified class in addition to the default class. E.g. +myDisabledclass.
